QuestData.Title: Scratches
QuestData.Description: The pictograms indicate using feathers to cast the spell at one of the circles of power in Veil Lashh.$b$bConfusing iconography seems to show an arakkoa being suffused with the spirit of a kaliri.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Fistful of Feathers on the Lashh'an Spell Circle.
QuestData.CompletionText: This is exciting! I can't wait to examine the workings of the spell.
QuestData.RewardText: I don't know what to say. This spell is very strange. It is not a simple conjuration or enchantment, but some sort of communion or communication spell.$b$bI'm not sure what to make of it, $n. I'll have to think about it some more.$b$bBut thanks for your help, anyways! I'm sure I'll think through this sooner or later.

Objectives.Objective: Have Daranelle analyze the Kaliri aura
